title: NO FEE Luxury Flex 4BR or 3BR and 3 Bath, with stunning views and one
posting_body: ['NO FEE Luxury Flex 4BR or 3BR and 3 Bath, with stunning views and one of the best amenities in NYC!', 'Listing ID #: 138208', 'Price: $14,150', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 3.0', 'Bathrooms: 3.0', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Pool', 'New Construction', 'Laundry', 'Bicycle Room', 'Storage', 'Nursery', 'Lounge', 'Valet', 'Roof Deck', 'Wheelchair Access', 'WiFi', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Receiving Room', 'Business Center', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Walls OK', 'Dishwasher', 'Washer', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Marble Bath', 'Light', 'NO FEE', 'Walk In Closet', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Convertible', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Penthouse', 'Unit Features: This Flex 4 or 3BR and 3Bath is 1,667 square foot, with an open gourmet kitchen and breakfast bar.', 'This spacious corner residence faces North West and South West, with NY Harbor views and expansive City Skyline.', 'Warm, modern interiors are brought to life by the renowned design team at Meyer Davis Studio.', 'This residence features imported stone and custom finishes, premium Miele appliance package, 5" wide stained oak flooring, master bath with custom wood cabinetry, marble tile walls and mosaic floors with radiant heat, undermount Wetstyle sink with glass vanity top and Dornbracht polished chrome faucets and a washer and dryer.', "Building Features: Fitness Center, Private garden, BBQ Grills, Demo Kitchen, Swimming pool, Cigar room, Wine room, Bowling alley, Full-size basketball court, Children's playroom, Business center, Private cinema, Private driveway, Garage, Private dog park, Library and lounge, Sauna, Jaccuzzi, Plunge Pool, Treatment rooms, Golf simulation, Squash court", 'Bolin Tang', 'Phone: (908) 247-0048', 'Mobile: (908) 247-0048', 'Fax: (212) 227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'New York Living Solutions - Keller Williams New York City \xa0 (908) 247-0048 \xa0 (908) 247-0048 \xa0 FAX (212) 227-1120 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Bolin Tang at (908) 247-0048']
